ModMetaData.name: Room Temperature Display
ModMetaData.author: hawqeye19
ModMetaData.description:
Displays each room's temperature directly on the map, helping you monitor heating and cooling at a glance.
• Small wall-adjacent labels when the temperature overlay is off. • Large centered labels when the in-game temperature overlay is on. • Optional color gradients for cold, comfortable, and hot ranges. • Settings menu to adjust comfort thresholds and gradient behavior. • Toggle display with a Play Settings button (green checkmark when active). • Labels only appear in proper, fully roofed rooms (ignores doorways and outdoor spaces). • Automatically updates when room shapes or temperature change.
Requires Harmony.
